thread.title: Hamas Accepts Ceasefire Proposal in Gaza Strip from Egypt and Qatar Mediators – Latest Update
thread.title_full: Hamas Accepts Ceasefire Proposal in Gaza Strip from Egypt and Qatar Mediators – Latest Update

author: world today news
title: Hamas Accepts Ceasefire Proposal in Gaza Strip from Egypt and Qatar Mediators – Latest Update
text:
Hamas issued a statement on the 6th, announcing that it agreed with the ceasefire proposal in the Gaza Strip proposed by the mediators.
CCTV International News reported that Hamas said it accepted the ceasefire plan proposed by Egypt and Qatar as mediators. The statement said that the head of the Hamas Politburo Haniyeh had spoken to the Prime Minister of Qatar and the head of the Egyptian intelligence agency, saying that Hamas agreed to its cease-fire plan, however, it was not details of the ceasefire plan have yet to be released.
[Buidheann Naidheachd Meadhan/Aithisgean farsaing de naidheachdan cèin à Cairo air an 6mh]
The war between Israel and the Palestinian armed group Hamas has lasted for almost seven months and Qatar.
A Hamas statement read that Hamas political leader Ismail Haniyeh informed Qatar’s Prime Minister and Egypt’s intelligence chief that Hamas accepted their cease-fire proposal​​​​.
Reuters said Israel had no immediate comment on the matter.
BBC News reported that details of Hamas’ acceptance of the ceasefire offer from Egypt and Qatar have not yet been released, including how long the ceasefire will last. and whether the couple was held in the Gaza Strip by Israeli hostages.
Hamas officials pointed out that after accepting the ceasefire proposal put forward by the mediators, “it now depends on Israel’s response.”
Hamas agrees to cease-fire proposal
